goals__remit:
The association’s aim is to support and represent the interests of its international and national member associations in the development and implementation of aerodrome (ADR) and air traffic management (ATM) related regulations and policies in Europe. 
 
The member associations themselve are representing 145 (spring 2012) aerodromes and air navigation service provider.
